item.title: leaflet + widgeframe
item.description: The two examples below show how to properly embed a leaflet widget inside a blog post using the widgetframe package. Leaflet 01 library(leaflet) library(widgetframe) ## Loading required package: htmlwidgets l <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% setView(0,0,2) frameWidget(l, height = '400') {"x":{"url":"/post/leaflet_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_leaflet-01.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Leaflet 02 library(leaflet) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(widgetframe)) l <- leaflet() %>% addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter) %>% setView(0,0,2) frameWidget(l, height = '300') {"x":{"url":"/post/leaflet_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_leaflet-02.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}
